description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes

sector.narrative: Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
Stimulating demand for and capacity to use data

title.narrative: Malawi United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Malawi Country Programme Document 2012-2016 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Malawi 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Malawi Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes

description.narrative: UNICEF Malawi has benefited from using Results Based Management guidance and tools to plan and monitor resulting in 86 per cent utilization of the overall budget, 100 per cent donor reports submitted timely (84 reports), only 0.1 percent DCT aged six to nine months, quality internal and external work plans and reports produced. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/12/2019

title.narrative: Percentage of Section unliquidated balance aged over 9 Months
Percentage of Section Programme Budget utilised (RR & OR)
Number of programmatic adjustments done as a result of feedback from communities
Proportion of satisfactory responses received from beneficiaries and partners in regard to assistance provided by UNICEF
